participant_1.name: Lucas
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and curious, enjoys engaging in conversations about hobbies and interests with a creative flair.
participant_1.background: i try various coffees as a hobby. i am a huge star wars fan. i played football for a division a college. i enjoy poetry.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Melancholic and introspective, tends to express his struggles openly and often seeks connection despite his circumstances.
participant_2.background: my wife left me and took my children. i do not believe in god. i'm overweight and unhappy. i work at a nursing home. i spend most of my time on facebook when i'm not working.
